attributes.description: The largest contact lens manufacturing and distributing  plant in the United States is that of Bausch and Lomb's located in Tampa Bay, Fl.

attributes.description: While most polyacrylamide producers are incorporated in Europe, most of their processing and producing plants are located throughout China

attributes.description: Polycrylamide Producers purchase both propene and silicone in order to produce polycrylamide. The oil and silicone companies sell their respective products to the polycrylamide producers
